nodes.text: The TranLang III communications module was a late-generation communication module incorporating up to six million galactic languages in its language memory discs, installed in 3PO-series protocol droids and LOM-series protocol droids.

As well as common languages, the module's database included obscure dialects, trade languages like Bocce, security codes, and droid transmissions like Binary. In addition, the TranLang III's phonetic pattern analysers made it capable of learning and translating new languages.
